content.detailedDescription:
i was driving from three hills alberta to calgary alberta. i was on a rural highway and my speed was about 60mph. at the moment i saw the object i was about 5 miles from three hills traveling south.
i was relaxed and listening to the radio. i felt heat or pressure or maybe a shadow caught my attention and i turned me head to the left and that is when i saw the object. it was a sphere flat black or teflon like looking and moving fast from east to west and it appeared to be descending. it was large, i compared it to a small house and there was a glowing sun or reflection on it on the area facing south east. it looked like a small pulsing sun! i only had a brief moment to see and experience this. i tried to talk myself out of seeing it but it was real i saw it. that night i had what felt like a high fever but my temperature was normal. i had a sore throat for a couple of days and drank water constantly.
about two weeks after this sighting i met a truck driver who has been driving a route out in that area for over twenty years. without telling him what i saw i asked him if he ever saw anything unusual during his drives. without hesitation this was his answer" i have not seen anything out of the ordinary for twenty years until this january[2015]. since january i have seen "black suburban's like the the fbi have or like the tv show csi,  i have seen hundreds of them since january" i then told him what i saw. he said he believed me because of what he was seeing.
that's it
bw
content.summary: I was driving north to south on hyw 21 rural alberta. i felt "something" on my left side and turned to see a black sphere  about 200 feet  above me.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on valley blvd in rosemead looking west, i saw what i thought was a bright star or venus, but
it's impossible to see either at that time, it was still bright out; and being one of the hottest days of the year, still very sunny. 
*i noticed a similar starlike portal event on 7/26 of this year 2015 over the san gabriel mountains, over the towers. this was right before my brother noticed an orange flame, with a ship at it's head; which vanished leaving a cigar shape black object hovering under where the flame used to be. (back to this new sighting).
this starlike object, was not a plane's lights or anything like that, it hovered in one spot, then vanished suddenly.
then i noticed an orb like object far, and i mean far east of my direction over in the azusa mountain area. it was miles and miles away from my location. it performed a non-newtonian loop and head over the mountains.
then i saw what might have been a second orb, white in color, flash down temple city blvd., however i could not make too much out of it for i couldn't get a clear sight on it. it may have not been an orb but a quadcopter perhaps. it performed some unusual spins just south of valley blvd.
content.summary: Another possible star portal with orbs after

content.detailedDescription: I was living rurally at the time and one night my car ran out of fuel about 5km from my house. my boyfriend at the time and i decided to walk home as it was around 2 am. my house was on old farm land so not many homes were around. we walked about 4km just talking normally away, when from nowhere a huge yellow orange light shone down on us from above, like someone had turned on a switch. i would estimate the radius of the light to be at least 7-8m diameter, the ground and trees on either side of the road were lit up. there was absolutely no noise, it wasn't a windy night, and the skies were completley clear. the light shone for about 6-7 seconds and just shut off, silently. after a few seconds i forced myself to look up and saw nothing but the night sky, no lights no shapes and no sound of anything. the light seemed to be coming from something not far above us, within 10m. my boyfriend was completely freaked out, told me to be quiet and that he just wanted to get home. it took us another 20min to get home, we took a short cut through our paddocks and once home my boyfriend refused to speak about it at all! he told me to never bring it up again, that he was going to pretend it had never happend. i told my dad the next day and he had trouble believing me, saying it was a helicopter or plane but it couldn't have been. both those things have noisy engines and whatever this was didn't move at all and made no sound, not a whir or click, absolutely quiet.
content.summary: While walking home at night after my car ran out of fuel, my boyfriend and i were talking away and a huge yellow/orange light shone down on us from directly above, maybe 10m high. there was no noise, then after around 7 sec the light turned off.

content.detailedDescription: I live in a valley area in the mountains of wnc. there are typically cesna type airplanes along with your typical jet airliners and our medical helicopter that usually only appears when someone needs to be with lifted to one of the icu units in asheville nc of johnson city tn. i don't quite exactly remember if it was before july 4th or after. all i do recall is after i seen what i seen and made the following phone calls that i did i haven't seen anything before or after like this period. the sky is clear warm summer night for these mountains very enjoyable. i had an interest in ufos and etc at the time but no where near like i do now because of it. i think i may have been setting off bottle rockets or something like that. i looked up on my ridgelines as i have two of them o. either side of my house here and noticed lights shaped like white orbs and then disappearing as they centered somewhere straight ahead of my house. the other extremely odd thing that was happening was these lights were on either side of these ridges going the same direction then when they disappeared it was as if clouds had suddenly appeared and there was constant lighting in the distance as if lighting off for every single orb that passed by. i asked my dad to come look at these lights and light show because i thought they might be black ops helicopters and my dad had worked on the electrical systems when he was i. the army (1991 - 1993). my dad came outside and observed soon noting like i did that there was no noise at all. next he told me to call the sheriff's department to find out if the military might be doing training in th e area. they said they didn't know of anything going on and said to call the airports to inquire. called 2 different local airports and they said they knew of no training going on and nothing on radar. so with that mindboggled by the time i hung up the phone with the last person the lights and lighting had stopped. i haven't spoke anything of this publicly as i was mindboggled and didn't know who to report it too. i'm doing so now in hopes maybe someone out there has been something similar and can enlighten me on what this was. again as i mentioned i haven't seen anything in the skies before or after like this at all. i've been from here to ca looking to the skies hoping to see the same event and never have.
content.summary: Many other like lights that were stream lined (following one another) then disappearing into clouds in the horizon.

content.detailedDescription: I live in the country on about 4 acres and was at home. i took about 9 or 10 pictures during my morning meditation as i often do when the clouds have whisps or unique characteristics. when i looked at my pictures that's when i noticed this weird shape in it and it looked so out of character. i didn't witness it when it was there, because i couldn't see it, but, my iphone camera did. it picked up something, i don't know what the heck it is. i sent some of my pictures to my brother and he including everyone i've asked don't know what it is. i/they think it could be an orb, angel, drone or spaceship. my brother said to contact you, so that's what i'm doing. the object appears to be hovering or staying stationary and it's like a glowing white shape, but it is not a definite shape that i can tell. when i noticed it in my pictures, not all of them, just the pictures i took in the middle of my photo session, i thought and then asked my girlfriend, what the h*ll is that? i showed her and my son and they were tripping out. when i meditate i am constantly looking up towards the sky/universe and i didn't see anything out of the ordinary but, felt like i was being watched. so if anyone can please tell me what the heck is going on here, i would be so grateful.
content.summary: I took pictures of the clouds and didn't see anything unusual until i viewed my pictures a few hours later.

content.detailedDescription: I live in the country on about 4 acres and was at home. i took about 9 or 10 pictures during my morning meditation as i often do when the clouds have whisps or unique characteristics. when i looked at my pictures that's when i noticed this weird shape in it and it looked so out of character. i didn't witness it when it was there, because i couldn't see it, but, my iphone camera did. it picked up something, i don't know what the heck it is. i sent some of my pictures to my brother and he including everyone i've asked don't know what it is. i/they think it could be an orb, angel, drone or spaceship. my brother said to contact you, so that's what i'm doing. the object appears to be hovering or staying stationary and it's like a glowing white shape, but it is not a definite shape that i can tell. when i noticed it in my pictures, not all of them, just the pictures i took in the middle of my photo session, i thought and then asked my girlfriend, what the h*ll is that? i showed her and my son and they were tripping out. when i meditate i am constantly looking up towards the sky/universe and i didn't see anything out of the ordinary but, felt like i was being watched. so if anyone can please tell me what the heck is going on here, i would be so grateful.
content.summary: I took pictures of the clouds and didn't see anything unusual until i viewed my pictures a few hours later.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at godfrey hotel rooftop bar in downtown chicago 8.1.15-8.2.15.
these lights were not readily visible to me at the time that the picture was taken.  
this is an open-roof nightclub.  there were no obstructions in my view while taking the picture.  i took 3 photos of this skyline, and all of them show strange lights or anomalies over the chicago skyline.
no sound was heard, nor was anything spotted visually at the time that the photos were taken.
the pictures were taken with an iphone 6 camera.
i found it notable that the lights appeared in a very organized and geometric pattern.  
granted, there are plenty of helicopters and airplanes in the sky over the city at any given time.  i think the photo(s) will adequately show that the possibility of this sighting being attributed to conventional aircraft is unlikely. 
these pictures were taken by my iphone, and then posted on this forum, with no alteration whatsoever.  i make no claims or speculations about said photos.  however, i would be remiss if i did not confess that the pattern of lights in the photo did not remind me somewhat of the "phoenix lights" event.  
if needed, i may be able to provide additional photos and/or information on the sighting.  
photo 1 is the most notable.  photos 2 and 3 were taken before photo 1 to my knowledge.
content.summary: Recognized lights after the fact.  was invisible until seeing pictures. strange formation.

content.detailedDescription: On a camp site between many island campground and the low water bridge in hardy ar. have seen lights in the sky several times but most notable on june the 21st of the last eight years. we have several witnesses to these events from this private camping area. sightings are always at night and varied times. the first time lights were noticed with a friend who is facing north and i west, we both are describing a pair of lights doing the same thing in two different directions. we both have 20 years of military service and ruled out anything we have witnessed of known aircraft , civilian or military. the actions and motions of theses sightings have been consistent until recently. they went from star like fast moving, hovering, gyrating to glowing orbs, to being able to see windows. recently myself and anther person witnessed a group of friends having a greenish beam or spot light put on them, they could see the craft but we could not. there was a light fog but the light projected was sharp and very clear around them. the one flashlight in the group was not capable of making that light source and did not make the light. it  has a halogen  bulb and was much bluer in color.Also the light source was not coming from the flashlight, but shining down on them  from above. we are no longer surprised by the lights. we just hope if its ours. if not we hope they're friendly. this sighting ,like most others, it was there and then it was gone.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Have seen ufo:s several times at spring river location  the last time a glowing green flash of lights was projected at friends

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i exited her backyard through a gate in her block fence. as we exited the gate facing south we immediately noticed a large number of amber lights in the sky south of us. i pulled out my phone, an iphone 6, and tried to capture video as we walked quickly down a 400 yard alley southbound. the lights were traveling in the same direction and didn't appear to change their position relative to each other as they moved east. i witnessed the famous phoenix lights in the late nineties and again in spring 2001, and these lights were the same color and seemed to be about the same altitude. this altitude i would guess is somewhere in the range of 800-1200 feet. they seem to be the same color as the amber colored lights that light freeways, but moving through the sky. as we watched and i kept trying to film them, they moved east and seemed to decrease in number, although i could not see any single light actually blink out. there was a bright moon in the eastern sky and some high thin clouds, and a slight breeze was blowing. as i watched they kept moving downrange toward the east until i could not see them anymore. i have combed the internet for any news and even called tempe police to ask if they had received any calls about the lights the preceding evening, but the dispatcher i spoke to, a female, said that she had been on shift the night before between 9 and 10 o'clock and had heard nothing about them. while filming i said out loud that since they were flying right over tempe, they would probably be all over the news and youtube. i called my 18 year old daughter and asked her if she had seen the lights a few minutes later. she stated via text that she had been driving and saw them, and had immediately thought of the movie darkest hour, which was strange because the same thing had run through my mind. when i asked her how many lights she had seen she said...I don't know. like a hundred or something. i will include my video file but it is in my opinion a very poor record of what happened. i am sending it in the hopes that it can be enhanced somehow.
content.summary: Large collection of amber lights about 1-2 miles away. traveling same speed and direction, covering approx. 4-5 miles eastbound on a moonlit night.

content.detailedDescription: My matress is on the floor below a wide window in the west corner of my room. i was lying on it facing the window the blinds were drawn but not closed and there are a lot of trees in my backyard but i still can see objects such as airplanes the moon and stars.  i was smoking an e cigarette gazing at my tablet put it down changed internet radio channels looked up, saw the ufo. it was the size of a quarter on the western horizon.  i saw it fly very fast instantaneously through a clearing in the trees i estimate it was heading northwest as it flied right.
content.summary: Crescent white fireball shaped ufo in west horizon flies instantly horizontally northwest

content.detailedDescription: I thought they were planes but no flashing lights were on. i looked because they seems to be traveling very fast and were close together. i thought it was too close and fast to be planes but maybe they see satellites? but they were too low for that. then the lead one disappears and then the second one did. i felt like it was not normal and said it looks like ufo! no sound was made. they oiled the size of satellites. my friend agreed it was unusual and not planes.
content.summary: Looking up at the stars coming out just after dusk when two star like objects that were close  together were following each  other.They disappeared one after another . i told my friends to look because they were too close together.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: I wasnt there at the time, but my friend was taking pictures cause he wanted to see how good picture taking was on the phone when out of nowhere it appeared, seafair was during this time, but the blue angeles  weren't in the sky, they were still at the museum  of flight. but my friend the said the object moved at i'm possible speeds and in weird directions, and since i watch the mufon tv show i thought it would be right to talk about it here, my friend also said the object when up into the clouds and it didn't come down for 1 minute when it appeared right were it went up, the object continued to move around when it flew into the distance disappearing. also i'm not sure if this is fake or real, but if it is fake don't come after me or anything, i'm just trying to report something also don't post it on an media. i don't want to be a problem to my most favorite  ufo website and tv show.
content.summary: I wasnt there my friend said he was taking pictures when suddenly , it appeared

content.detailedDescription:
We were housesitting for my partners' parents home in rockford. two years ago we had a the same type of sighting at that house that followed me around all over michigan for over a week. i was waiting to see if it would happen again, and it did. i had the tripod set up and was taking long exposure shots of the area, and full moon when i first noticed it pop in. i immediately started taking pictures at first it was really low on the horizon, just over the trees much lower than the passenger planes we saw that night. i took a series of 10 second exposure shots, i wanted to show its movement. it took a few shots to get my tripod steady, even the slightest movement from the camera operations can be enough to make light trails. the light was stationary at first, the only reason it looks like it is moving in the first two photos is because of the camera's movements. it was quite bright early on. we believe it was over the sw end of a lake that is back behind the house. by then i had gotten my tripod steady, and self timer working correctly. it then moved left out of sight. two minutes later it appeared in a blink of an eye and started flying ne over the house. in the long exposure shot where you can see it turning i had the camera set to 30 seconds. so that is the distance it traveled in 30 seconds. i felt like it knew we were there, and i signaled it with a uv laser. we had multiple sightings of the same craft over a few days.  i could only upload so much so the rest can be given to the field investigator at a later time. 
in the first video we forgot the camera when we ran through the house, but in it you can see the craft after it's gone you can see a plane and clearly see the difference. i have two more video from another night that i couldn't upload.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A silent bright light flies over the house in rockford. makes abrupt turn.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking  down  a  beach . 3 miles from the cook nuclear  plant. listening   to music . i don't   remember  turning it off but it stopped   playing .  i stopped  to throw a rock and bam. right to the left of my throwing  path  was this pyramid  shaped  craft  hovering  appeared  out of nowhere  i sat on the sand  and blink it was gone . it did not take off it just disappeared . i stood   up talking   to myself   about what i saw. i picked up another rock. threw it in the air again .  and bam there it was in the same spot i tried to get a better look at it but i was almost right under it. no lights no sound. and blink it was gone again   but this time i felt dizzy when it disappeared .  i looked around and i saw no one else. just then a very small plane or drone flew straight   past where i was. i have seen   things after that day but never   that pyramid  craft. and when i try to focus on it things get fuzzy. i waited till now to report it. i felt the need to get it out.
content.summary: Pyramid  shaped. at first i thought   i was looking at the back of it.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside with my boyfriend by our backyard fire pit looking up (this seemed as 
though i was drawn to the exact spot in the sky before it happened) i saw what initally stunned me and i split secondly wrote it off as a shooting star. but it was as though it slowed down time specifically so i could see it. im pretty sure it was only in the sky for at most 10 seconds it was extremely fast and almost fell ouf of the sky in a swooping down motion and abrubtly turned at a steep angle straight up and dissapeared. my boyfriend saw the last part when it changed direction and dissapeared so we know this is hard to disporove with modern science laws. and then there was the difference in the way time moved when i was watching it. it felt like i was being selected and time slowed down just for me so i was able to witness in slow motion the craft rotate to the side in a fluid motion so the bottom was facing me exactly and i could see the individually and eaually spaced lights which were white and pulsating in a pattern with a larger light directly in the center. i saw this for what must have been meerly a second but lasted for what felt like 2 minuets. i was stunned so much i couldnt speak or move to gesture towards it so my boyfriend could see (this felt like i was screaming inside "are you seeing this!" but nothing could come out) until it rotated back so the bottom was again parallel to the ground and in a split second changed direction at a 90 degree angle faceing up and dissapeared the last thing we saw was the direction shift and a brief trail of light in the direction it was going but it completely dissapered. i have never experianced anything like this in my life and i am an extremely logoical and scientific person. i am undoubtedly positive this was a ufo and it wanted me to see it.
content.summary: A large close saucer shaped craft seemed to slow down time on purpose. it seemed to fall out of the sky in a swooping very seamless motion but was silent, it was initally sideways and turned exposing the bottom with  induvidually spaced lights

content.detailedDescription: Me my brother and mother took a vacation to arizona near flagstaff and we had a house on top of a rock in a more rocky hilly area and it was around 11 o'clock at night and me and my mother were tired and went out stargazing and all of the sudden a circular ovally object flew over head but looked like it was probably in the stratoaphere and high up and it sat there for around 5-10 seconds flashing beams of multi colored beams of lights that were blue and purple and we noticed it and i was very scared and then it made a real big flash of these colors and beamed away out of sight.
content.summary: Flew above flashed multiple lights beamed away fast

content.detailedDescription: I first noticed the star like objects over two years ago never would i think they would be as frequent as they are now. in a given month i can spot and locate what appears to be star like objects moving in the sky once a week maybe even more . i've had plenty of friends come over and observed them and what we can all simply describe as stars moving in the sky. the ufos don't look any brighter sometimes a bit dim but exactly like stars. i first i thought they might be satellites but after seeing them in pairs/groups and swimming effortlessly trough and around stars i realized i had no idea what we keep seeing just from my backyard. i grew up in mexico always a believer but never seen anything in 23 years and now for the past two years i keep.Spotting these star like objects do some incredible things. from illuminating brighter to just burning out like a light bulb in the sky to what it appear to be merging with stars. i've tried recording with no luck since is just my phone .I reached out to you guys and  all i simply want is advice on what type of camera i can purchase so i can be able to record the sky at night and finally get footage of what we see all the time.Please and thank you
content.summary: The stars move and appear to swim in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I'm not sure of the date.  it was either the night of december the 25th to the 26th or the night of december 30th to january 1st (1999 or 2000). 

i was over my in-law's home in my husband's second floor room.  the house is near a town call temiskamig shores.  back then, the town was called new liskeard.  

this house is in the country surrounded by crops in the summer.  just two neighbours accross the road.

very late at night, before going to bed, i was looking at the window (facing south)  thinking that the neighbour on my right, accross the road, had great christmas lights when i saw, in the sky, a bright blue-green glowing orb coming from the west going east (from my right to my left).  at first, it was small but it grew bigger as it passed in front of the window than got smaller as it went slowly away.  it was going on a straight line meaning it wasn't going up nor down, just straight.  it was silent and somehow beautiful. a more or less 10 second experience .

it's hard to tell how far from me it was but i would say maybe between 100 to 500 meters and on the horizon line.

i didn't get scared.  i wasn't drunk or anything :)  i'm not the only one who saw it.  one of my haunt told me she saw it too while driving on the road on the quebec side.  but like me, she can't recall the year. 

i'm sure it wasn't an airplane, an helicopter or a meteor (wasn't falling, wasn't making sound, no bleeping lights, etc) or lightning.  by the way, this house is very far from an airport.

i'm a serious person and have a good job, i don't talk about it a lot...

it might be a coincidence but we had an eartquake on the morning of the first of january 2000 but like i said, i'm not sure of the date i saw the orb, it might be a different year but i'm sure it was either 1999 or 2000 christmas time.

i'm aware it might not be an extraordinary testimony but you never know, it might be the piece that may complete a puzzle...  who knows? 

anyway, it felt nice to tell the story to some people who will take me seriously.


thanks,
content.summary: I saw a bright blue-grenn glowing orb pass in front of the second floor window.

content.detailedDescription: After co-facilitating a shamanic dance journey, my partner and i were standing in a field in upstate ny & staring at the stars when we observed a strange orb of light in the distance. it was traveling in dance-like patterns and seemed to be changing to all different glowing colors. we then spotted another, in a different part of the sky, that appeared stationary but also appeared to be shining in all different colors. half joking, half serious, i said to the orb - "if you're a ufo, do something and show me." immediately after, a third craft flew directly overhead, so close that we could see its underside in some detail. it had four lights around its perimeter, and one in the center. the ones around the perimeter were blinking rainbow in a circular, sequential pattern. it was difficult to see the shape of the actual craft (the lights were the most visible) but it appeared to have an oval, kind of saucer like shape. it made no noise at all, which surprised us, as it was so close. it disappeared behind some trees in a matter of seconds. afterwards i felt intense excitement and a sense of awe, as well as a tiny bit of fear mixed with a lot of curiosity about whatever entities we were visited by.
content.summary: Three crafts observed - glowing and blinking rainbow

content.detailedDescription:
Aug 2, 2015
perhaps 15 minutes before midnight the two of us observed a shooting star from the south to the north overhead on the rooftop of my building in downtown toronto.

12:08am - for a distance that i would say is no more than 6-inches across the sky, tracking in a linear direction of a west to east direction but in the sky north of avenue and davenport rd rooftop location, we noticed a round, thick white light turning on and off to a rhythm of on for a count of 1 and 2 and, off 3 and 4 and, on 5 and 6 and 7 and off 8 and 9 and for a total of 5 on lights all together. what is totally strange for me is that at 3 ons  i flashed on my green starlight lazar and when i flashed it through the dark from 3 black 4 black and 5 it turned off but seemed to move faster for a moment and out of sight. the size of the light was bigger than a commercial jets frontal high beam light coming towards someone, yet was lit from underneath, not in the forward direction. also the light beneath it was somewhat subdued and not as bright as the planes in the distance flashing as they moved off in all directions. that it seemingly immediately reacted to my lazar when i flashed at it was outstanding.

12:24am - travelling from nw towards the moon in a se direction (north of avenue and davenport again) was a cylinder shaped object tumbling or spinning in a clock-wise direction in almost a slow motion-like momentum, much like one would expect to see in space, yet close enough for us to see it with our naked eyes even though it was night, traveling within a halo of very soft, subtle and subdued light. the object seemed to be illumined with a subdued, washed-out amber and green light. it looked like the cylinder was a 4:1 ratio of length to width. in the sky it measured approximately 5mm and with the halo closer to 7mm in diameter. it was lower than the clouds but higher than the jets flying east, taking off from the airport. i pointed my green laser and could see the object get hit from the beam a number of times, much like i could see the lazar hit the side of a building in the distance with a focused dot. the cylinders surface seemed like it was a reflective surface judging by the green lazars clear visibility. the cylinder disappeared from view as it got closer to the full moons brightness. 

we noticed both objects roughly in the same area of the sky, initially, though they traveled in different directions. 

it was a very electric energy that awakened and excited us. this is my 3rd unknown flying object sighting in a week and each time they were witnessed with the same friend. i wonder if she is the reason why because i have never had a sighting before this, except once, caught on camera in joshua tree ca in june and last summer in a ufo group meeting where some bright light seemed to descend towards the group and then take off quickly in another direction. the lights leave me curious but the cylinder shape tumbling and spinning is very exciting and highly strange. 

i am attaching some images i saw online to give an example of the cylinder proportion as well as the green subdued color from another online image. i didn't have a camera or phone with me, again!
content.summary: Two events - 12:08am and 12:24am both very different and from my rooftop

content.detailedDescription: Walking in neighborhood with mother about 10:30 pm.  i commented to my mother that there was a very bright cloud above us.  then i realized it was a sharply defined bright white light almost above us.  was not the moon, because moon was in the opposite direction.  mother commented that it must be what a ufo is like.  we watched it for 30 seconds and it began to "melt" away, getting smaller until it disappeared.  both of us were skeptics, but afterwards, we felt amazed that things like this exist.
content.summary: hole in clouds, very large bright light through hole, disappeared

content.detailedDescription: At 9:00 pm looking due south over west brighton staten island ny saw several orange orbs of orange light going west to east in a sreight line one light every 2 to 4 min over a 30 min time frame no sound , planes flying in the sky to local airports each light lasting aprox 1min before fadeing out in the same place in the sky like a light bulb on a dimmer switch do not know if these lights were meteors burning up
content.summary: Orange fire ball

content.detailedDescription: While  camping my wife and i looked up into the sky and noticed a star that seemed to be getting brighter and brighter. my wife pointed towards it, i noticed that it it was on a direct path towards with us at a a high rate of speed.  then it immediately slow down and then descended even further to the treetops where it stopped  and seemed to hovered. we watched this ufo through the trees whereit  absolutely made no sound whatsoever.  after about 2 minutes the object is completely gone.
content.summary: Ufo over our campsite- bright white light

content.detailedDescription: July 4, 2015 lakewood, ca near long beach while watching fireworks, husband and i and neighbors noticed orange floating object that was neither fireworks nor planes nor blimp we decided. good year blimp is a familiar sight so we would have known if it was that. it was too large and low in the sky to be a star. although we are near the lb airport, we see planes and helicopters all the time. it seemed to hover and was like nothing we had ever witnessed in the sky then or since. my thought was it might have been ufo blending in with july 4 activity while observing us. my husband suggested it was a drone. we watched it for a while and then went back to fireworks after giving up on trying to figure out what it was. at the end of the night, we picked up our son from a friends house and were driving home and saw the same object still hovering in the direction of the golf course on carson street. last night while catching grunion we were discussing it with others who witnessed the same but reported seeing green floating object. we have been puzzled over it since and wondered if there have been other reports.
content.summary: Orange object floating over lakewood ca neighborhood on july 4 2015

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of a hot air balloon launch at a balloon rally.  later, when looking at my pictures i noticed and object in the sky that i didn't see while taking the photo.  no one else noticed it that i know of at the time.  i showed the picture to my son and he recommended that i send the photo to you.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of a hot air balloon launch and later discovered an object in the photo with the balloon

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting in our hot tub in the back yard looking at the stars, when all of a sudden i saw three objects in a triangle pattern. i couldn't speak so i pointed at them to my wife and she said what the hell is that? it seemed as if they weren't glowing but reflecting light from the moon, when it got to a certain angle i could make out a dark triangle shape with a "glowing" triangle like shape on each corner. the objects at each corner appeared to be a triangle shape,but had a weird shape to them almost like a design. it was about the size of a football field, and it's really hard to judge how long we actually saw it for. it seemed like minutes but i would say it was only a couple of seconds maybe five to ten. it was moving quickly in a upward motion, then just vanished. it never made a sound, and it was a clear night with a full moon. it was almost like it "cloaked itself" and disappeared. my wife and i were cold and had goosebumps and i could feel every hair on my body stand up. we were sitting in 100 degree water in the middle of summer. i jumped up and ran inside to see what time it was, and had intentions on reporting this last night but my computer was upgrading to windows 10.
content.summary: My wife and i were sitting in our hot tub in the back yard looking at the stars, when all of a sudden i saw three objects in a triangle pattern. i couldn't speak so i pointed at them to my wife and she said what the hell is that?

content.detailedDescription:
Husband and myself watching shooting star from balcony of jandia princes hotel on fuerteventura, canary islands in spain. it was a very clear sky, our room overlooked the sea in the direction of morocco. no ships at sea and no lights coming from the hotel to hinder our unblocked view. the sea filled about 1/3 of our view, the rest was clear sky. there was a moon out, we could clearly see an airplane pasing over and occassional shooting stars. i am used to watch shooting stars, as i used to watch them anually at my late brothers house in germany. (its very dark there).
my husband was amazed, he had never seen so many stars before and in awe with their beauty. we saw an occassional shooting star (about 5-8 in total) when we sat on our balcony, for about 30 minuts to an hour. we were on the top floor of the building.

all of a sudden, a rather bright star that had been stationary right in front of us, about 45 degrees above the horizon, the whole 30 minuts that we were watching, shot away up and to the right, with a tail, looking like a shooting star, that fast, but going "the wrong way": up in stead of down. 
as it was above sea, we have no idea how close it was. it could have been a small object closeby or a large object far away.  there were airplanes passing by every now and then (not many) so a pilot must have noticed this.
my husband and i were perplexed and looked at eachother not wanting to believe what we just saw. i said "did you see that???" he said that he did. i said "shooting stars do not go up, don't they? i thought that was just a star but it went up! wtf?" husband agreed shooting stars do not go up and that he too thought it was just another star before it suddenly shot off up to the right, but didn't want to talk about it anymore. we went inside immediately. he didnt want to watch shooting stars again after that, nor can i bring up the subject. i'm 51. i have never seen something like that. nor me or my husband use any alcohol or drugs.
content.summary: Watching shooting stars with husband over sea from hotel. "star" suddenly shot away up toright with tail

content.detailedDescription: The first sighting occurred while i was on one of my frequent camping travel trips around the uk, i had stopped on the back roads about 10 / 15 miles south-east of northampton. while getting ready to go to bed,i was enjoying the beauty of the late night sky. it was then i noticed a strange grouping of lights, at first i only saw the three white lights. they were at about 30-40 degrees above the horizon and travelling in a northeasterly direction to my position, at about 75 - 100 feet in height. as the object moved i then then noticed it made increases in height and direction that just seemed to be bizarre. i was totally fascinated by what i was watching although at that time i had no fear of it at all. i watched as it rose in the sky, so it was now about 150 ish feet high, i took my torch and started to flash at it. to my complete surprised the object stopped dead where it was and just hung there motionless. it then headed straight at my location and it was now i began to feel uneasy and called myself every name under the sun for being so stupid. before i had finished berating myself the object was on top of my location. now i had a view of the object. it was a black triangular craft about 35 - 45 ft { in length on its 3 sides }, in each corner was a brilliant pure white light while in it's very centre it had one reddish orangey coloured light. it just floated there about 30 ft above me in complete silence, although the air felt like it was full of electrical energy { like during a massive thuthunderstorm }, this reddish orangey light had become a pure cylindrical beam which totally encompassed me. i still felt no fear although i don't know why, it was almost like i was being reassured that i wouldn't come to harm. the next thing i knew was watching the object head north for a few minutes before it shot upwards so fast that it had completely vanished from sight in seconds. as i was packing my camping gear on my bike at first light a black saloon car pulled into the lay-by. two men walked over to me and asked me  about what i saw, as i hadn't been able to tell anyone { i hadn't a mobile phone in 1991 } i felt uneasy but i had to tell someone,  i thought they had seen it to. it was during my retelling of this event i became increasingly nervous and concerned about these men. they hadn't identified themselves or even introduced themselves yet hear i was telling them this fantastical story. i stopped and asked if they had seen something aswell, but to my complete horror and surprise i was now being told i hadn't seen anything and nothing had happened to me.  the two men had made it very, very clear that the consequences of doing so would hurt those around me { my friends and family }. i have kept this to myself ever been to since as i totally believed they would do what they had threatened. i had another encounter with this object or one identical to it three yrs later outside brighton in 1994,although the encounter was slightly different.
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Seen while camping about 10 / 15 miles outside northampton, also saw again outside brighton.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigarette with a college, when we heard a helicopter fly over head we seen the helicopter fly ove the building, then we notice a craft at a very high altitude, red lights on the top, with a pulsating green light on the bottom, it moved in different directions like i've seen no other aircraft do, then from a stationary position it just took off at a very high rate of speed, i have never seen anything like this, nor had my work college, i sent a message via twitter to the faa, but no reply, we would really love to know what this was.
content.summary: Red light on top, green light pulsating on bottom, changed direction slowly, then from a stationary position shoot of at unknowing speed.

content.detailedDescription: One of my favorite things to do is look up at the night sky in hopes that i see another extraterrestrial aerial vehicle.  at 2:30am mdt i was sitting on my chair with the satellite tracker trying to view when the international space station would pass over my location.  i looked at my clock on my taskbar and then seen on satellite tracker that i had 6 more minutes to wait until iss is above me.   as i checked the time a streak caught my eye so i fixed my gaze upon it.  pointed my bright led flashlight at the object and flashed it several times hoping the occupants would notice me and swing around to have a look.  i lost view of it after it went past my garage for about 5 seconds.  i live across from the national air guard base so i see military aircraft flying daily at the same altitude.  this object was about 500ft in the air and less than a mile from me.   i believe 1/4 mile is an accurate distance from me.  it had to have been traveling supersonic speeds. however, it was silent.   it was triangle shaped but i can definitely tell where the front of the vehicle was as opposed to the sides.   it was a dirty white color and the sides had a dark goldish (rust) with brown fins. (or lines).  this is the second time i've seen this type of object from my backyard during the early hours.
content.summary: Silent and fast headed south
